title: Convert Hour to Time of Day
description: This function converts an input time in hours to a Time of Day (TOD) format. The input is a real number representing hours, which is multiplied by 3600000 to convert it into milliseconds before being converted into TOD format.
name: HOUR_TO_TOD

input.name: IN
input.description: The input time in hours that needs to be converted to Time of Day.

return_value.description: Returns the equivalent Time of Day representation of the input hours.
